#id=1
#text=Earlier this week I went to get a haircut .
#id=2
#text=Over the summer I had just gone for a cheap haircut at Great Clips and I ended up with a bad haircut .
#id=3
#text=I went back to a nicer place where I had to pay more , but I had to do something about the bad cut .
#id=4
#text=I had to cut most of it off to start over .
#id=5
#text=This last cut was the first time I started to see some of the growth coming back and some of the curl !
#id=6
#text=Lots of people make standing hair appointments , but I prefer to just call when my hair was bugging me so once the ends started looking straggly I called and went in .
#id=7
#text=I checked in at the front desk and had a nice chat with the receptionist who is getting ready to go out on maternity leave .
#id=8
#text=Then my stylist took me back and asked me if I was still growing out my hair .
#id=9
#text=I said I was so she looked it over and then gave me a nice scalp massage and a shampoo before cutting .
#text=The cut is about the same length as it was the last time I got it cut , but it is getting more and more even every time .
#text=My stylist likes to straighten my hair on each visit so she can make sure it is all correct .
#text=Looking forward to it growing some more .
